title: Delivery truck went to the wrong Linwood Street, and now a basement is filled with oil
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News The oil was supposed to be delivered to Linwood Street in Malden, not Medford.
A delivery truck pumped over 350 gallons of oil into the basement of a home on Linwood Street in Medford, instead of Malden, on Monday.
The 385 gallons of oil were supposed to be delivered to 48 Linwood St.

title: Review & setlist: Stevie Nicks wraps TD Garden in friendship — and iconic capes
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Concert Reviews "I just want you to know that you live in a very, very, very attractive city.
However, it is a very, very, very cold city.
" Stevie Nicks, here at Gillette Stadium in 2023, was in Boston Monday night after having to cancel a scheduled show this past August due to an injury.

title: Wu not interested in ‘bromance’ with Trump, she says after Mamdani’s White House trip
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Politics Heading into her second term, Mayor Michelle Wu is not backing down from her antagonism of the Trump administration.
Boston Mayor Michelle Wu speaks during the "No Kings" protest rally on Boston Common in October.

Craig Walker / The Boston Globe, File Boston Mayor Michelle Wu said this week that she has no interest in a friendly meet-up with President Donald Trump, unlike New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani.

title: R.I. school cancels rest of football season after players charged with assaulting special needs student
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News Newport School Committee plans to take up the issue at the next meeting.
Newport police have charged four teenagers in connection with the assault of a student with special needs at Rogers High School.
Police say they arrested a 17-year-old and a 14-year-old on Monday, charging both with assault.

title: Red Sox acquire 3-time All-Star pitcher Sonny Gray
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Red Sox In return, Boston will send St.
Louis left-handed prospect Brandon Clarke and right-hander Richard Fitts.
Sonny Gray has spent his last two seasons with the Cardinals (Jeff Roberson/AP Photo).

title: Neemias Queta injury: How the Celtics feel about going small
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Celtics "Both teams were doing it to each other.
When you have ten guys out there that can do it it just becomes a track meet.
" Neemias Queta did not return in Sunday's game against the Magic with an ankle injury (Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff).

title: Authorities say 1975 killing of 22-year-old N.H. woman has now been solved
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The initial suspect, Judith Lord's neighbor, has been found responsible for her murder.
Judith Lord.
– New Hampshire Department of JusticeThe 1975 murder of Judith Lord in New Hampshire has now been solved through modern forensic science, the state Attorney General’s Office announced Monday.

title: Holiday TV specials 2025: A complete schedule of how to watch your favorite classics
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: TV Your viewing guide for 2025 holiday TV specials, from Charlie Brown to "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer.
" How to watch all of your favorite holiday TV specials, including "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer," "Dr.
Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas," and "A Charlie Brown Christmas.

title: Tufts warns students to avoid Somerville massage therapist
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The university issued a no-trespass order on Friday, barring the therapist from campus.
Tufts University in Medford.

Scott Eisen Tufts University issued an advisory Friday warning students and staff to avoid Sam Peck, a massage therapist at Soarbody Therapeutics in Somerville, a practitioner many in the Tufts community have visited for years.

title: Red Sox reportedly ‘showing interest’ in J.T. Realmuto
author: Hayden Bird

257 with 12 home runs and a .
700 OPS in 2025, playing in 134 games for Philadelphia.
